recipes.name: Apple Salad
recipes.author: sdkjksd
recipes.description: A delicious and refreshing salad made with fresh apples and grapes.
recipes.instructions: Combine the sliced apples and grapes in a bowl. Toss gently and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.author: abcdefg
recipes.description: A rich and decadent chocolate cake that will satisfy your sweet tooth.
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C. In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and melted butter. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour the batter into a greased cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes. Let it cool before serving.

recipes.name: Tomato Pasta
recipes.author: xyz123
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a flavorful tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté minced garlic until fragrant. Add chopped tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes break down and form a sauce. Add cooked pasta to the sauce and toss well. Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.
